com.simple3d.events

Class EventManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.simple3d.events.EventManager

  • public class EventManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles Events and Listeners. When callEvent is called, this class looks through all of its registered Listener objects and calls each method that has the annotation @EventClass before it, only has one parameter, and that parameter's type extends Event.
    Author:
    ClairaLyrae

    • Method Detail

      • registerListener

        public boolean registerListener(Listener l)
        Registers an object that extends Listener to the EventManager. The Listener class' methods are scanned and if they have the annotation @EventMethod, only one parameter, and that parameter's type extends Event, then the method is saved along with the Listener. Once registered, calls to callEvent will result in that Listener's matching methods being called.
        Parameters:
        l - Listener to register
        Returns:
        If listener was valid and successfully added.

      • unregisterListener

        public void unregisterListener(Listener l)
        Unregisters a Listener class and removes it from the event system
        Parameters:
        l - Listener to unregister

      • hasListener

        public boolean hasListener(Listener l)
        Checks if a listener is registered to this manager.
        Parameters:
        l - Listener to check
        Returns:
        Is listener registered

      • callEvent

        public void callEvent(Event e)
        Notifies all registered Listeners that the event has occurred and calls their methods (if any) that match the event.
        Parameters:
        e - Fires an event to all registered Listeners.
